rukus.text: 20|2|yeung minban banhchouh kompir kuor an tow aoy anak  daembi aoy anak  lombak noh laey .
20|3|leuklengte chea kar romluk dl anaknea del kaotakhlach  a l laoh bonnaoh .
20|4|( kompir kuor an nih) kuchea kar banhchouh mk pi mcheasa del ban bangkeut phendei  ning mekh cheachraen chean del khpasa bamphot .
20|5|trong chea mcheasa mha sabborsa now leu a r sh .
20|6|avei  del now leumekh cheachraen chean  ning phendei  ning avei  del  nowchanloh vea teangpir  promteang avei  del now kraom dei  kuchea kammosetthi  robsa trong .
20|7|haey brasenbae anak( mou ham meat) b po  ch nh saamleng(buongsuong som  ryy romluk chhmoh a l laoh) khlang   ku pitabrakd nasa  trong doeng karosamngeat  ning avei del athrkambang bamphot .
20|8|a l laoh kuchea mcheasa del kmean mcheasa na phe  sa ng trauv ke korp  sakkar da pitabrakd krawpi trong laey .  trong meanochhmoh cheachraen da  laobrapei .
20|9|tae rueng robsa mou sa ban mokadl anak haey ryy now

20|10|nowpel del( mou sa thveudamnaer) keat bankheunh ponluphleung muoy  haey keat ban pol towkean kruosaear robsa keat tha  chaur puok anak  now tinih sen choh  pitabrakd nasa khnhom bankheunh ponluphleung muoy sangkhum  tha khnhom nung yk phleung muoy dom mk bangkeat aoy puok anak  ryyka khnhom nung chuob kar changaoul  bangheanh nowkanleng ponluphleung noh .
20|11|haey nowpel del keat ban towdl ponluphleung noh ke  ban haw keat tha  ao mou sa
20|12|pitabrakd nasa  yeung kuchea mcheasa robsa anak.  dau che  neah  chaur anak  daoh sbekcheung teangpir robsa anak chenh .  pitabrakd nasa  anak sthet  knong chrolng tou vea da pisedth .
20|13|haey yeung ban chreusareusa anak( daembi tow ampeavneav  hvie r aon) .  dau che  neah  chaur anak sdab nouv avei delke nung phdal vea hi choh .

20|14|pitabrakd nasa  yeung kuchea a l laoh  del kmean mcheasa na  phe  sa ng trauv ke korp sakkar pitabrakd krawpi yeung laey .  dau che  neah  chaur anak korp sakkar mk champoh yeung  ning trauv brate b tde sa la t daembi  chea kar romluk dl yeung .
20|15|pitabrakd nasa  thngai barlok nung mokadl  yeung staerte  leakbang vea  daembi ke nung tabasnang aoy real  roub nouv avei delke kampoung kham  broengobreng .

20|16|dau che  neah  chaur kom bandaoy aoy anak del kmean chomnue nung vea(thngai  barlok)  ning anak del ban thveuteamchamnng chetd robsa ke mokrea reang  anak( mou sa) ampi vea( chomnue nung thngai barlok)  del cheaheto thveu aoy anak  vineasa a nd reay aoy saoh .
20|17|tae avei tow nowknong daisdam robsa anaknoh  ao mou sa

20|18|keat ban pol tha  vea kuchea dambng robsakhnhom  del khnhom tb chomhr  nung vea  haey khnhom angruon( sloekchheu) nung vea aoy ppe robsakhnhom haeyning  samreab brae vea chea phalobrayoch phe  sa ng  tiet .
20|19|trong ban mean bantoul tha  chaur anak baoh vea choh  ao mou sa
20|20|haey keat kaban baoh vea  rompechnoh dambng ban klaytowchea  satv psa muoy vea r yeang rhsa .
20|21|trong ban mean bantoul tha  chaur anak chab yk vea mokvinh haey  saum anak kom khlach  yeung nung thveu aoy vea bre tow chea roubpheap daem vinh .

20|22|haey chaur anak yk dai( sda) robsa anak dak chaul tow chamhieng  khluon( khangchevng) robsa anak  vea nung chenh ponlu sa chengchang daoy minmen  chea brakear akrak laey  te vea chea mou chi hsaa t muoy phe  sa ng tiet .
20|23|daembi yeung nung bangheanh anak  pi phosdo tang  robsa yeung muoy  chamnuon da thomaschary .
20|24|chaur anak towkean hvie r aon.  pitabrakd nasa  ke kuchea anak  del ban bampean( kmean chomnue  phdachkar) .
